name: Goblet Squat
description: Hold a dumbbell at your chest, squat down keeping your chest up and core tight, then stand up.

name: TRX Row
description: Hold TRX handles, lean back, pull chest toward hands while keeping your body in a straight line.

name: Dumbbell Chest Press
description: Lie on a bench with dumbbells, lower to chest, press back up until arms are extended.

name: Barbell Back Squat
description: Barbell on upper back, squat down keeping chest up and knees out, drive through heels to stand.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Sit at pulldown station, grip bar wide, pull it to your chest keeping your torso upright.

name: Plank
description: Rest on forearms and toes, keep body straight and abs tight. Hold position for time.

name: Seated Leg Curl
description: Sit in machine, bend your knees to pull pad toward glutes, then return to start.

name: Hip Thrust
description: Upper back on bench, barbell over hips, thrust hips up by squeezing glutes, lower back down.

name: Leg Press
description: Sit in leg press machine, feet hip-width on platform, lower and press back up.

name: Seated Calf Raise
description: Sit, feet on platform, push through toes to lift heels as high as possible.

name: Adductor Machine
description: Sit, legs against pads, squeeze legs together and return with control.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
description: Lie on incline bench, press dumbbells overhead, lower under control.

name: Pull-Up/Assisted
description: Hang from bar, pull chin over bar, lower with control. Use assistance if needed.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
description: Dumbbells at sides, raise arms to shoulder height, lower under control.

name: Cable Bicep Curl
description: Grip cable bar, curl bar toward shoulders keeping elbows at your sides.

name: Face Pull
description: Cable at upper chest, pull rope handles toward face, leading with elbows.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Lie on your back, feet flat, drive through heels, lift hips and squeeze glutes.

name: Machine Row
description: Sit with chest against pad, grip handles, row back by pulling elbows to sides.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Lie on bench, dumbbells in hand, lower to chest and press up until arms are straight.

name: HIIT Row Sprint
description: Row at all-out effort for set time, rest, repeat for intervals.
